channel.title: Client closes when I click somewhere to walk
channel.description:
Hello guys, for some reason my client closes when i click to walk somewhere ingame.
If someone has teamveiwer can you help me?

item.title: Client closes when I click somewhere to walk
item.dc:creator: @dds_asap dds asap
item.description:
@dds_asap wrote:

its quite simple and the dude above me had the right idea but he decided to be an asshole and post a virus. you need to download a .bat to .exe converter. for some reason windows 7 is bugged and crashes the cmd when ever java try’s to talk with it. by using a .exe windows 7 can control it and allow them both to work together allowing you to play.

Read full topic
item.source: Client closes when I click somewhere to walk

item.title: Client closes when I click somewhere to walk
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“flentman, post:4, topic:371417”]Don’t Listen Do These Morrons, They Don’t Know Anything

How I Fixed This:

Its Very SIMPLE, Download This Program (Link Was Created When I Posted)

http://www.mediafire.com/?j07icbgf10zbhgq

Once You Downloaded It, Run It.

Click The Button On The Line With “Batch File:”
Click The Button, A Window Will Open. Now Look For Your Client\Server Run.bat
Click OK.

Second Button At Line “Save As:”
Click It, A Window Will Open Now Write A Name For The New File That Will Be Created. Click Save.

Click The “Compile” Button On The Bottom Of The Program And The File Will Be Created Where You Saved It.

Go To The Client\Server Folder Where You Saved The New Run.exe File,
Run It And Everything Should Work Fine, If Not Make Sure Its In The Folder With Run.bat[/quote]
Way to post a virus maker ass hole, go sit in your closet and cry.

Read full topic

item.title: Client closes when I click somewhere to walk
item.dc:creator: @flentman flentman
item.description:
@flentman wrote:

Don’t Listen Do These Morrons, They Don’t Know Anything

How I Fixed This:

Its Very SIMPLE, Download This Program (Link Was Created When I Posted)

http://www.mediafire.com/?j07icbgf10zbhgq

Once You Downloaded It, Run It.

Click The Button On The Line With “Batch File:”
Click The Button, A Window Will Open. Now Look For Your Client\Server Run.bat
Click OK.

Second Button At Line “Save As:”
Click It, A Window Will Open Now Write A Name For The New File That Will Be Created. Click Save.

Click The “Compile” Button On The Bottom Of The Program And The File Will Be Created Where You Saved It.

Go To The Client\Server Folder Where You Saved The New Run.exe File,
Run It And Everything Should Work Fine, If Not Make Sure Its In The Folder With Run.bat

item.title: Client closes when I click somewhere to walk
item.dc:creator: @Pest Pest
item.description:
@Pest wrote:

You have Windows 7. I have the fix for this.
Replace your run.bat with this-

@echo off title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx200m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause
Then compile/run! Hope i helped ya!

Read full topic
